column1: I<s>n what month in [FILL] did you first use OxyContin in a way a doctor did not direct you to use it?</s>

column2: Len : 2    MONTH 1ST USED OXYCONTIN NOT DIRECTED BY DR
OTE: The variable PNRNMREC is a recoded variable that was created from PNRNMLIF, the 12-month misuse variables of specific pain
Len : 2    RC - MOST RECENT PAIN RELIEVER MISUSE (RECODE)
83 = DID NOT MISUSE PST 12 MOS (LIFETIME UNK) Log assn ................................
OTE: PNRNMINIT is "reverse coded" from the answers in PRL03. PRL03=1 (yes) was recoded to 2 in PNRNMINIT because this answer means
that the respondent misused pain relievers before the past 12 months (and therefore is not a past year initiate for misuse of pain relievers). PRL03=2
(no) was recoded to 1 in PNRNMINIT because this answer means that the respondent did not misuse pain relievers before the past 12 months (and

column1: therefore is a past year initiate for misuse of pain relievers).

column2: arlier questions were about the past 12 months. This question is about any time before then, that is, any time in your life before [DATEFILL].
t any time before [DATEFILL], did you ever use any prescription pain reliever in a way a doctor did not direct you to use it?
Len : 2    PAST YEAR INITIATE FOR ANY PAIN RELIEVER MISUSE
4 = Not past yr initiate LOG ASSN (from skip pattern) ......................................................
83 = NOT PAST YR INITIATE (AT-RISK STATUS UNKNOWN) ................................
93 = DID NOT MISUSE PAIN RELIEVERS IN THE PAST 12 MOS .............................
